entry.title: ABS-CBN goes off air in compliance with NTC order

media:group.media:title: ABS-CBN goes off air in compliance with NTC order
media:group.media:description:
ABS-CBN went off air after the National Telecommunications Commission issued a cease and desist order following the lapse of the network's broadcast franchise.

entry.title: NTC sympathizes with ABS-CBN, but law has to be followed - official | DZMM

media:group.media:title: NTC sympathizes with ABS-CBN, but law has to be followed - official | DZMM
media:group.media:description:
A National Telecommunications Commission official said that the agency is just "following the law" in ordering ABS-CBN Broadcasting Corp. to "immediately" stop operations even though it sympathizes with the company whose franchise expired May 4 and a renewal bid remains pending in Congress.

entry.title: CMFR: NTC pinangunahan ang Kongreso sa isyu ng ABS-CBN franchise | TV Patrol

media:group.media:title: CMFR: NTC pinangunahan ang Kongreso sa isyu ng ABS-CBN franchise | TV Patrol
media:group.media:description:
Para kay Center for Media Freedom and Responsibility Chairman Vergel Santos, pinangunahan ng National Telecommunications Commission ang Kongreso sa isyu ng prangkisa ng ABS-CBN nang maglabas ang komisyon ng cease and desist order laban sa network. Binigyang diin ni Santos na Kongreso ang dapat magpasya sa isyu ng prangkisa.

entry.title: DOJ nanindigan sa posisyon kaugnay ng tuloy-operasyon ng ABS-CBN | TV Patrol

media:group.media:title: DOJ nanindigan sa posisyon kaugnay ng tuloy-operasyon ng ABS-CBN | TV Patrol
media:group.media:description:
Inihayag ni Justice Secretary Menardo Guevarra na pinayuhan nila ang National Telecommunications Commission na hayaang magpatuloy ang operasyon ng ABS-CBN habang nakabinbin sa Kamara ang mga panukala para sa pagpapalawig ng prangkisa ng network, lalo't ganoon naman daw ang ginawa dati sa iba pang istasyon. Ito raw ang patas na solusyon lalo at walang batas na tutugon sa situwasyon ng broadcast network.

media:group.media:description:
